mapper.select: SELECT RT.ID ,RT.REVIEW_ID ,RT.TITLE ,RT.CONTENT ,RT.WRITER ,RT.STAR_NUM ,RT.INSERT_TIME ,RT.TYPE ,RT.NAME ,RT.DATA ,PT.DATA DATA2 FROM TB_REVIEW RT ,TB_PRODUCT PT WHERE REVIEW_ID = #{reviewId} AND RT.ID = PT.ID
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R, TT.* FROM TB_REVIEW TT WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' AND ROWNUM <= (#{page} + 1) * #{size}) WHERE R > #{page} * #{size}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_REVIEW WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_REVIEW WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' AND ID = #{id}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R, TT.* FROM TB_REVIEW TT WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' AND TT.ID = #{id} AND ROWNUM <= (#{page} + 1) * #{size}) WHERE R > #{page} * #{size}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_REVIEW (ID, REVIEW_ID, NAME, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, STAR_NUM, INSERT_TIME, TYPE, DATA) VALUES (#{id}, SQ_FILES.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{starNum}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + 9 / 24, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{type}, #{data})
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_REVIEW SET DELETE_YN = 'Y', DELETE_TIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + 9 / 24, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') WHERE REVIEW_ID = #{reviewId}
UPDATE TB_REVIEW SET DELETE_YN = 'Y', DELETE_TIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + 9 / 24, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
